column4: is there anyone running ubuntu 9.04 willing to attach the file /boot/grub/menu.lst to an email and send it to chickens_for_the_win@hotmail.co.uk please?
i may have edited that file without making backups beforehand :P
If you post your menu.lst and any errors/relevant info I think I can fix yours.
ah, I can't help you then. Although I could probably hack together a working file for you if I knew 1)What drive Ubuntu's /boot is on 2) what version of the kernel you have.
